actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to prevent the discharge in bankruptcy of debts becoming due within 5 years of filing in bankruptcy on educational loans provided for in Federal loan programs.

summary.text: Prevents, under the Bankruptcy Act, the discharge in bankruptcy of debts becoming due within five years of filing in bankruptcy on educational loans provided for in Federal loan programs.

titles.title: A bill to prevent the discharge in bankruptcy of debts becoming due within 5 years of filing in bankruptcy on educational loans provided for in Federal loan programs.
